trans-unit.source: Provides classes that write XPS documents to a data store or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Fornece classes que gravam documentos XPS em um armazenamento de dados ou a fila de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> class provides the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> methods that output [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents to a data store or print queue.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> classe fornece a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> métodos de saída [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documentos para um dado armazenar ou fila de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Separate groups of write methods are provided for different content types including <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
trans-unit.target: Grupos de métodos de gravação separados são fornecidos para diferentes tipos de conteúdo incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> methods enable you to also include a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> with the document, plus pass additional information to the handlers of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted>, <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> métodos permitem incluir também um <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> com o documento, além de informações adicionais de passagem aos manipuladores do <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted>, <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingProgressChanged>, e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> eventos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] consulte o XML Paper Specification (XPS) disponível para download em [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
